DOC.brief_summary: This study compare capecitabine/oxaliplatin adjuvant chemotherapy versus observation alone chemotherapy-naive participant undergone potentially curative resection gastric cancer . Participants randomize either chemotherapy arm observation arm . Capecitabine administer orally , 1000 milligram per meter-squared ( mg/m^2 ) twice daily ( BID ) Days 1 15 3-week cycle , 8 cycle , oxaliplatin administer intravenous ( IV ) infusion , 130 mg/m^2 every 3 week 8 cycle . The anticipated time study treatment 6 month target sample size 1024 individual .
